actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to represent, and to authorize the testimony of and production of documents by, staff assistants of Senator Dodd in the case of Salzberg v. Marks.

summary.text: Directs the Senate Legal Counsel to represent certain staff assistants in Senator Dodd's office who may be asked to testify in the case of Salzberg v. Marks. Authorizes the staff assistants to testify in such case except concerning matters determined privileged from disclosure.

titles.title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to represent, and to authorize the testimony of and production of documents by, staff assistants of Senator Dodd in the case of Salzberg v. Marks.
